title: I just got the phone. Started the process. Then someone came and I had to put the phone aside. When i came back, the phone was all black, only one litttle red light bliking on top and I can not turn it on. Tried restarting by holding the power button for about 30 seconds as described in the help center. Any suggestions?
content: I just got the phone. Started the process. Then someone came and I had to put the phone aside. When i came back, the phone was all black, only one little red light blinking on top and I can not turn it on. Tried restarting by holding the power button for about 30 seconds as described in the help center. Any suggestions?
